entity.name: Playlists
entity.query: SELECT p."playlistId" id, p.name, p.owner, p."createdAt", p."updatedAt", p.description, p."deletedAt", p."songsChangedAt", p."curatedAt", p."curatedBy", p."minNps", p."maxNps", p."totalMaps", p.type, STRING_AGG(pm."mapId"::varchar, ',') mids, u."verifiedMapper" FROM playlist p LEFT JOIN public.playlist_map pm on p."playlistId" = pm."playlistId" JOIN uploader u ON p.owner = u.id WHERE "deletedAt" IS NULL GROUP BY p."playlistId", u.id
entity.deltaQuery: SELECT "playlistId" id FROM playlist WHERE "deletedAt" IS NULL AND CASE WHEN "updatedAt" > "songsChangedAt" THEN "updatedAt" ELSE "songsChangedAt" END >= '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT p."playlistId" id, p.name, p.owner, p."createdAt", p."updatedAt", p.description, p."deletedAt", p."songsChangedAt", p."curatedAt", p."curatedBy", p."minNps", p."maxNps", p."totalMaps", p.type, STRING_AGG(pm."mapId"::varchar, ',') mids, u."verifiedMapper" FROM playlist p LEFT JOIN public.playlist_map pm on p."playlistId" = pm."playlistId" JOIN uploader u ON p.owner = u.id WHERE "playlistId" = ${dataimporter.delta.id} GROUP BY p."playlistId", u.id
